snippet: HSBC has been used by Mexican drug cartels, Saudi Arabian banks with terrorist ties, and Iranians trying to circumvent United States sanctions, a report from a Senate committee says.
abstract: HSBC has been used by Mexican drug cartels, Saudi Arabian banks with terrorist ties, and Iranians trying to circumvent United States sanctions, a report from a Senate committee says.

headline.main: Regulators and HSBC Faulted in Report on Money Laundering
headline.print_headline: Regulators And HSBC Are Faulted By Senate
